homepage.title: Image Geolocation Recognition - AI-Powered Photo Location Identification
homepage.subtitle: Upload images to instantly get geographic location information
homepage.description: AI-powered recognition based on GLM-4.5V model, supporting continent, country, city, specific location and GPS coordinate identification
homepage.featureDescription: Free online image location recognition tool. Simply upload a photo to get detailed geographic location information. Supports attraction introduction generation, intelligent conversation interaction, and one-click sharing. Privacy protected, no registration required.

uploadArea.title: Upload Image for Recognition
uploadArea.description: Supports JPEG, PNG, HEIC, HEIF formats, max 10MB
uploadArea.dragText: Drag image here, or click to select file

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How to use the image geolocation recognition feature?
faq.answer1: Simply upload any image, and our AI system will automatically analyze the geographic features in the image to identify detailed location information including continent, country, city, and specific place names.
faq.answer2: Supports common image formats including JPEG, PNG, HEIC, HEIF, with maximum file size of 10MB.
faq.answer3: Based on the GLM-4.5V flagship visual reasoning model, it has high accuracy for recognizing famous landmarks and buildings. The clearer the image and the more obvious the geographic features, the better the recognition results.
faq.answer4: We value user privacy protection. Uploaded images are only used for geographic location recognition and will not be stored or used for other purposes.
